last_episode_to_air.name: Bob
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mie meets the witness who saw her with Thomas right before he disappeared. Dr. Mommaerts gets Mie to remember her final encounter with Thomas.

name: Tabula Rasa
overview: A psychological thriller about Mie, a young woman with amnesia who is locked up in a secure psychiatric hospital. Mie is visited by Detective Inspector Wolkers who claims she was the last person seen with the vanished Thomas Spectre. As a witness and prime suspect, she appears to be the sole key to this mysterious disappearance. In order to solve the puzzle and find Thomas, Mie has to reconstruct her lost memories and find her way back through the dark labyrinth of her recent past.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: When a young woman with amnesia becomes a key figure in a missing persons case, she must reconstruct her memories to clear her name.

episodes.name: Spectre
episodes.overview: Mie, who has amnesia, finds herself in a locked psych ward, where a detective questions her about the recent disappearance of a man with whom she was seen with.

episodes.name: Houdini
episodes.overview: Mie loses her temper at a family birthday party and becomes suspicious of her husband; Inspector Wolkers finds evidence linking Mie to Thomas.

episodes.name: Bird for the Cat
episodes.overview: Thomas invites Mie to meet him at the recycling center, where they form a connection; Benoit receives a gift with an indiscreet message.

episodes.name: Ariadne's Wire
episodes.overview: Worried about her daughter's behavior, Mie hires "spiritual cleansers" to exorcise their home; Inspector Wolkers reveals an ulterior motive to Mie.

episodes.name: V.
episodes.overview: Mie undergoes hypnosis. A family Halloween party takes a somber turn. Suspicious of her husband's frequent outings, Mie decides to follow him.

episodes.name: The Bear Pit
episodes.overview: Mie confronts her family, demanding to know what they've held back from her, and later learns more about her worrying medical history.

episodes.name: Wally
episodes.overview: A few weeks before the disappearance, Benoit spots a message on Mie's phone and follows her; Vronsky asks Mie for a tiny gift in return for a favor.

episodes.name: Wood for the Trees
episodes.overview: The day of the disappearance, Mie overhears an argument between Benoit and her mom. Nikki visits Mie at the hospital and reveals a secret.

episodes.name: Bob
episodes.overview: Mie meets the witness who saw her with Thomas right before he disappeared. Dr. Mommaerts gets Mie to remember her final encounter with Thomas.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: When a young woman with amnesia becomes a key figure in a missing persons case, she must reconstruct her memories to clear her name.
